title: Creamy Sweetcorn Chowder
ingredients: ['240g chopped onion', '30g margarine', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '450g frozen sweetcorn kernels, thawed', '500g medium-chunk salsa', '415ml chicken stock', '225g cream cheese, softened', '250ml milk']
